paper_title.en: Total syntheses of (+)-spiculoic acid A and (+)-zyggomphic acid, new marine natural products of polyketide origin

description.en: The total syntheses of both natural (+)-spiculoic acid A and (+)-zyggomphic acid, new cytotoxic marine natural products of polyketide origin, have been accomplished for the first time. These syntheses were achieved by the highly stereoselective and high-yielding intramolecular Diels-Alder reaction of a functionalized (E,E,E)-2,7,9-dodecanal derivative to construct the core tetrahydroindan-2-one skeleton. A stereocongener of (+)-spiculoic acid A, i.e., the (2R,5S,6R)-isomer, was also synthesized. The details of these total syntheses are described. (C) 2011 Elsevier Ltd. All rights reserved.

paper_title.en: Total syntheses of (+)-spiculoic acid A and (+)-zyggomphic acid, new marine natural products of polyketide origin

description.en: The total syntheses of both natural (+)-spiculoic acid A and (+)-zyggomphic acid, new cytotoxic marine natural products of polyketide origin, have been accomplished for the first time. These syntheses were achieved by the highly stereoselective and high-yielding intramolecular Diels-Alder reaction of a functionalized (E,E,E)-2,7,9-dodecanal derivative to construct the core tetrahydroindan-2-one skeleton. A stereocongener of (+)-spiculoic acid A, i.e., the (2R,5S,6R)-isomer, was also synthesized. The details of these total syntheses are described. (C) 2011 Elsevier Ltd. All rights reserved.

paper_title.en: Recent Progress in Natural Product Synthesis Featured by Intramolecular Diels-Alder Reactions
SYNTHESIS OF NITROGEN- AND OXYGEN-BRIDGED SEVEN- TO TEN-MEMBERED CARBOCYCLES USING METATHESIS REACTIONS

description.en: This review describes the synthesis of nitrogen- and oxygen-bridged seven- to ten-membered carbocycles using metathesis reactions and their applications to natural products synthesis achieved in the past decade.

paper_title.en: SYNTHESIS OF NITROGEN- AND OXYGEN-BRIDGED SEVEN- TO TEN-MEMBERED CARBOCYCLES USING METATHESIS REACTIONS

description.en: This review describes the synthesis of nitrogen- and oxygen-bridged seven- to ten-membered carbocycles using metathesis reactions and their applications to natural products synthesis achieved in the past decade.

publication_name.ja: 第１０回有機合成化学談話会 有機合成化学協会

description.en: An enantioselective total synthesis of both enantiomers of caryophyllene-type sesquiterpenoid pestalotiopsin A has been achieved, thereby establishing the absolute stereochemistry of natural (+)-pestalotiopsin A. Highlights of the synthesis include a [2 + 2] cycloaddition of N-propioloyl Oppolzer's camphorsultam and ketene dialkyl acetal and subsequent highly stereoselective 1,4-hydride addition/protonation, an aldol reaction of functionalized bicyclic lactone with aldehyde, an efficient intramolecular Nozaki-Hiyama-Kishi (NHK) reaction for the construction of the highly strained (E)-cyclononene ring, and a palladium-catalyzed reduction of allylic mesylate with retention of the E configuration.

publication_name.ja: The Journal of Organic Chemistry The American Chemical Society

description.en: An enantioselective total synthesis of both enantiomers of caryophyllene-type sesquiterpenoid pestalotiopsin A has been achieved, thereby establishing the absolute stereochemistry of natural (+)-pestalotiopsin A. Highlights of the synthesis include a [2 + 2] cycloaddition of N-propioloyl Oppolzer's camphorsultam and ketene dialkyl acetal and subsequent highly stereoselective 1,4-hydride addition/protonation, an aldol reaction of functionalized bicyclic lactone with aldehyde, an efficient intramolecular Nozaki-Hiyama-Kishi (NHK) reaction for the construction of the highly strained (E)-cyclononene ring, and a palladium-catalyzed reduction of allylic mesylate with retention of the E configuration.
